ReportList.SERVICE_NAME:
select a.*,
IF(ReportPeriod = 'day','Every Day 09:00 (except Sat., Sun)',IF(ReportPeriod = 'week','Every Week 09:00 in Monday','Every Month 09:00 in First Monday')) as ReportPeriodName,
IF(Status ='Y' ,'Yes, report','Do not report') as StatusName,
(Select RoleName From Role Where RoleCode = a.MakerRoleCode) as MakerRoleName,
(Select RoleName From Role Where RoleCode = a.ViewerRoleCode) as ViewerRoleName
from ProjectReportConfig a
where PMCode = ?
